description: The Voyeur In the next scene, Eli Horst and Giovanni pair up, and the sucking/fucking/dildo/fisting action that ensues has to be seen to be believed! The camera pulls back and reveals that all this is just a video being watched by Club Inferno's newest discovery, Rick West. West works his hole over with various toys, then flips over on all fours and proceeds to fist his own capable crack! This is some of the best self-fisting ever caught on video! Mark Kroner and Rob Edwards (of FIST FOR HIRE fame) walk in to join West in a wild sucking/fucking/fisting hole-down, ending up with Knox and Edwards in a remarkable fisting 69!
title: Sit On It, Scene #02
